video.title: iZombie
video.synopsis: A medical student-turned-zombie tries to retain her humanity by eating brains at the morgue and finds she has an uncanny new gift for solving crimes.

episodes.synopsis: Once a doctor on the fast track, Liv Moore is now a zombie turned crime-solver who gets insights from eating the brains of murder victims.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: After eating the brain of a murdered artist, Liv absorbs traces of the victim's artistic passion. Later, the zombie who turned Liz asks for a favor.
episodes.title: Brother, Can You Spare a Brain?

episodes.synopsis: The hit-and-run death of a mild-mannered suburban dad takes a surprising turn. Liv grapples with human feelings for Major.
episodes.title: The Exterminator

episodes.synopsis: A new case involving a brutal gang murder puts suspicions about Clive's past into Liv's head. Major finally makes a decision on his new roommate.
episodes.title: Live and Let Clive

episodes.synopsis: Liv's new acceptance of her life as a zombie hits the rails when she has to eat the brain of an extreme sports fanatic who was an old friend.
episodes.title: Flight of the Living Dead

episodes.synopsis: Ravi cheers Liv on when a dead hacker's brains turn her into an obsessed gamer. Things get complicated for Liv when her mother and brother show up.
episodes.title: Virtual Reality Bites

episodes.synopsis: As Seattle's zombie plague continues, Liv and Clive investigate the death of a pregnant woman whose brains bring out Liv's maternal instincts.
episodes.title: Maternity Liv

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a radio show host who doled out relationship advice has Liv digesting some new insights about everyone's feelings.
episodes.title: Dead Air

episodes.synopsis: While Blaine and Major continue to circle each other, Liv and Clive's newest investigation places them in a game of paintball that could turn deadly.
episodes.title: Patriot Brains

episodes.synopsis: Liv and Major both have trouble coping with recent events, while Clive and Liv investigate a case linking psychotic episodes to a new energy drink.
episodes.title: Mr. Berserk

episodes.synopsis: A suspicious suicide puts Clive and Liv on a case involving Major. When Liv is able to eat the victim's brains, a strange paranoia comes into play.
episodes.title: Astroburger

episodes.synopsis: Liv thinks like a high-schooler to solve the murder of a drunken teenager. Later, she makes a shocking discovery about Sebastian.
episodes.title: Dead Rat, Live Rat, Brown Rat, White Rat

episodes.synopsis: While Ravi continues working on his cure, some old cases come back into focus for Liv and Clive ... and another one could leave Major in the cold.
episodes.title: Blaine's World
